data.content_en: We laughed and kept saying “see you soon”, but inside we both knew we’d never see each other again.
data.content_zh: 我们笑着说再见，却深知再见遥遥无期。

data.content_en: Moonlight city. You just couldn’t see an end to it. It wasn’t what I saw that stopped me, Max. It was what I didn’t see.
data.content_zh: 偌大的城市。延绵无尽。麦克斯，并非是我眼见的让我停住了脚步，而是我所看不见的。
